home.words: It feels so good that we are in the same city.

words.2014/7/12: What I did so far, is only for you.
words.2014/7/13: Always remember, you are mine, and I am yours.
words.2014/7/14: I am leaving, but I will never leave you.
words.2014/7/15: Are you missing me already? Me too.
words.2014/7/16: Quebec sucks. I can't find you here.
words.2014/7/17: I hope Brian take care of you.
words.2014/7/18: Happy birthday to your sister and dad!
words.2014/7/21: When you sneeze, I am missing you.
words.2014/7/22: Can you see my love in my paintings?
words.2014/7/23: You are the strongest woman in the world.
words.2014/7/24: Say hello to Dr. Chien for me.
words.2014/7/25: Sad five years and seven months, without you here.
words.2014/7/26: Wish you a fantastic lunch with Wify.
words.2014/7/27: Your smile is sweeter than the maple syrup.
words.2014/7/29: Let me show my French when we travel in France.
words.2014/7/31: If you were a conference, I will submit a paper every year.
words.2014/8/2: We will have the best Chinese Valentine's Day when I come back.
words.2014/8/3: It's a good time to get married, isn't it?
words.2014/8/4: Wish you a nice dinner with Chou and Wen Kai.
words.2014/8/6: Please stick with me when I come back.
words.2014/8/7: Thank you for the waiting, and I am coming back!
words.2014/8/8: I miss you at 10000 inches high.

words.2014/8/30: I will miss my little short hair girl.
words.2014/8/31: Don't cry for me baby. I will be back very soon.
words.2014/9/2: The One Kisses You Ought to be me.
words.2014/9/3: How about going to Disney Land with me in the future?

words.2014/9/5: Sorry for leaving again. I will be back soon too.
words.2014/9/6: Imagining our marriage life makes me so satisfied.
words.2014/9/7: Love is you, and you are my love.
words.2014/9/8: Wish you a happy Moon Festival.

words.2014/10/31: We had a nice goodbye in the morning.

words.2014/11/7: Are you coming to pick me up?
